entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Fermont
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:24 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -18.5°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -18.5°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 61 %

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
